ISSUE.TITLE: Discount update - There is already an open DataReader associated with this Command which must be closed first.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.30 beta Steps to reproduce the problem: 1) Add one discount with assign to product discount type click save and continue. 2)Add product at applied to product grid in my case i added **Apple iCam** 3) Now Switch discount type from assign to product **to** **Assign to categories** 4) Click save and continue You will get this error. **There is already an open DataReader associated with this Command which must be closed first.** https://www.loom.com/share/9cdb1c6573c24e9089413767495e53ed
